an6.74:1.1: “Mendicants, without giving up these six qualities you can’t enter and remain in the first absorption.
an6.74:1.3: Sensual, malicious, and cruel thoughts; and sensual, malicious, and cruel perceptions.
an6.74:1.4: Without giving up these six qualities you can’t enter and remain in the first absorption.
an6.74:2.1: But after giving up these six qualities you can enter and remain in the first absorption.
an6.74:2.3: Sensual, malicious, and cruel thoughts; and sensual, malicious, and cruel perceptions.
an6.74:2.4: After giving up these six qualities you can enter and remain in the first absorption.”
